sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Typography,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  Button,
  Paper,
} from '@mui/material';
import LinkedInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn';
import DownloadIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Download';
import DescriptionIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Description';

const Home: React.FC = () => {
  return (
    <Box>
      <Typography variant="h3" component="h1" gutterBottom>
        Welcome
      </Typography>

      {/* News Section */}
      <Card sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
        <CardContent>
          <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
            Latest News
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
            [Your latest news and updates will go here]
          </Typography>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>

      {/* Action Buttons */}
      <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 2 }}>
        <Box sx={{ flex: { xs: '1 1 100%', sm: '1 1 calc(33.333% - 16px)' } }}>
          <Paper
            elevation={0}
            sx={{
              p: 2,
              textAlign: 'center',
              bgcolor: 'primary.light',
              borderRadius: 2,
              height: '100%',
            }}
          >
            <Button
              variant="contained"
              color="primary"
              startIcon={<LinkedInIcon />}
              href="https://linkedin.com/in/your-profile"
              target="_blank"
              fullWidth
            >
              LinkedIn Profile
            </Button>
          </Paper>
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{ flex: { xs: '1 1 100%', sm: '1 1 calc(33.333% - 16px)' } }}>
          <Paper
            elevation={0}
            sx={{
              p: 2,
              textAlign: 'center',
              bgcolor: 'secondary.light',
              borderRadius: 2,
              height: '100%',
            }}
          >
            <Button
              variant="contained"
              color="secondary"
              startIcon={<DownloadIcon />}
              href="/path-to-your-cv.pdf"
              download
              fullWidth
            >
              Download CV
            </Button>
          </Paper>
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{ flex: { xs: '1 1 100%', sm: '1 1 calc(33.333% - 16px)' } }}>
          <Paper
            elevation={0}
            sx={{
              p: 2,
              textAlign: 'center',
              bgcolor: 'primary.light',
              borderRadius: 2,
              height: '100%',
            }}
          >
            <Button
              variant="contained"
              color="primary"
              startIcon={<DescriptionIcon />}
              href="/path-to-your-resume.pdf"
              download
              fullWidth
            >
              Download Resume
            </Button>
          </Paper>
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Home;
